section.p: You hand over the abzu plant. Cross it off your Adventure Sheet.
The Blender of Spices is amazed. 'I really didn't think you could do it!' he exclaims.

He rewards you by allowing you to consult his texts on herbs and plants of the wild. Roll two dice. If the result is higher than your SCOUTING rating then you can add one to that rating. He also gives you .

Your exploit has enhanced your reputation within the court. Turn to 401 and
add 2 to your Status points in the box provided, then make a choice from there.
